item.title: The First-Time Buyer Pre-Approval Checklist That Actually Works
item.description: Pre-approval should feel like a green light, not a guessing game. Yet most first-time buyers walk into the process without a plan, then scramble when lenders ask for documentation on tight deadlines. This guide lays out the preparation steps that consistently shorten review times and keep loan officers confident about your file.
